Class NetDrawing

public class NetDrawing
extends org.rakiura.draw.basic.BasicDrawing
implements PlaceListener, TransitionListener, NetListener

Represents Net Drawing.

Constructor Detail

NetDrawing

public NetDrawing()

NetDrawing

public NetDrawing(Net aNet)
Creates a new Net Drawing from the given net element

Parameters:
aNet - The net that has to be drawn.

NetDrawing

public NetDrawing(Net aNet,
                  java.util.Map superPlacesMap,
                  CPNSubNetFigure parentFigure,
                  NetDrawing parentDrawing)
Creates a new Net Drawing from the given (SUB)net element. It also draws the fake arcs and places

Parameters:
aNet - The subnet to be drawn
superPlacesMap - The places to which the arcs that cross the boundary between supernet and subnet can connect to.
parentFigure - the subnetfigure that contains this netdrawing
parentDrawing - the drawing that contains the subnetfigure 'parentFigure'.
Method Detail

newSimulator

public void newSimulator()

getSimulator

public Simulator getSimulator()

initDrawingFromNet

public void initDrawingFromNet(Net aNet)
Initializes a drawing from the given net object. This method will automatically generate all the figures needed to represent net elements from the given net. For changing only the net handle, use setNet(Net) method instead.

Parameters:
aNet - the net object
See Also:
setNet(org.rakiura.cpn.Net)

setNet

public void setNet(Net aNet)

getNet

public Net getNet()

addFigure

public void addFigure(org.rakiura.draw.Figure aFigure)
This method just adds the figure to the drawing, it does not update the net handle nor adds children.

Parameters:
aFigure - figure to be added to the drawing, without changes to the net handle.

add

public org.rakiura.draw.Figure add(org.rakiura.draw.Figure aFigure)
Called when adding a figure to drawing which is not part of the net yet. It Updates the net handle and adds all children.

Specified by:
add in interface org.rakiura.draw.Drawing
Overrides:
add in class org.rakiura.draw.figure.CompositeFigure
Parameters:
aFigure - the figure to be added
Returns:
the figure that was added (if it was not in the drawing yet)

addChildrenOf

public void addChildrenOf(org.rakiura.draw.Figure aFigure)
Adds the children of a figure to the drawing if they are not there yet.

Parameters:
aFigure - the figure with children. (should be a ParentFigure)

remove

public org.rakiura.draw.Figure remove(org.rakiura.draw.Figure aFigure)
Removes a figure. The children are removed as well. Removes netelements from the net. Does not remove a child on its own if the parent is an CPNabstractFigure

Specified by:
remove in interface org.rakiura.draw.Drawing
Overrides:
remove in class org.rakiura.draw.basic.BasicDrawing
Parameters:
aFigure - the figure to be removed
Returns:
the figure that is (to be) removed.

generateNetElementsBasedOnFigures

public void generateNetElementsBasedOnFigures()
Regenerates all net elements represented on the drawing by figures. This is utility method which processes all figures in a current net drawing, re-creating and updating the Net handle. Used after reading a serialized drawing, or, after reading pure net layout, without having the net handle correctly generated out of net file.

drawArcs

public void drawArcs(CPNTransitionFigure[] transitions,
                     java.util.Map placesMap,
                     java.util.Map superPlacesMap,
                     CPNSubNetFigure parentFigure,
                     NetDrawing parentDrawing)
Based on the given data, it recreates, reconnects and draws all the arcs.

Parameters:
transitions - CPNTransitionFigure array with all the transition figures.
placesMap - Place->CPNPlaceFigure map.
superPlacesMap - same as placesMap.
parentFigure - subnet figure.
parentDrawing - parent drawing.

isActive

public boolean isActive()
is there a transition firing and / or are there tokens in the net

Returns:
true if firingh or tokens, false otherwise

isFiring

public boolean isFiring()
is there a transition firing

Returns:
if firing true, false otherwise

isEnabled

public boolean isEnabled()
are there transitions that can fire

Returns:
true if there are enabled transitions, false otherwise

notify

public void notify(PlaceEvent anEvent)
Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed. It may be caused by either adding or removing a token from a Place.

Specified by:
notify in interface PlaceListener
Parameters:
anEvent - a PlaceEvent value

notify

Description copied from interface: PlaceListener
Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed. It is fired when tokens are removed from the place.

addNetListener

public void addNetListener(NetListener aListener)
Registers a given NetListener with this net.

Parameters:
aListener - a NetListener to be registered with this NetDrawing's Net.

removeNetListener

public void removeNetListener(NetListener aListener)
Deregisters a given NetListener from this net.

Parameters:
aListener - a NetListener to be removed from this NetDrawing's Net.

deReference

public void deReference()
Decouples the drawing from the net. Used if the drawing is not used anymore, but still listens to the net and netelements and this should not be the case.

reReference

public void reReference()
